Reviews.Title: A gem.
Reviews.Author: David W Pearson
Reviews.Content: I've been a Nikon user over the years thru film, early digital, and then had the 90D for the past 10 years. I've decided to get the D7100 as I now have more time and am trying to develop my ability to photograph. There is a degree of complexity in trying to use the D7100 that clearly indicates further progression in Nikon and phographic techknowledgy, it is certainly not an easier camera to use, but the product when used correctly can be fantastic. I love the challenge and the product.
